The claim was published on Facebook on M: 2020, along with a photo of Yasir Shah and a photo of what appears to be a deceased man.
The post: s caption stated that Yasir Shah died in a plane crash in Karachi, according to BCC news.
The claim circulated after a Pakistan In: PIA) plane crashed in Karachi on May 22, 2020, resulting in the death of nearly 100 people.
Shah: s presence on social media platforms, including Twitter, where he posted tweets and photos, indicated that he was alive and actively participating in cricket-related activities, contradicting the claim of his death.
